name: FiDo - Fiber Optic Documentation System
short_description: FiDo is a Fiber optic Documentation system. FiDo can store, analyze, and help you make better decisions about your fiber optic connections. Using a MySQL backend and PHP frontend, this web app can be put on a standard web server. Once set up, this allows you to access your data from anywhere, and because Fido is tablet friendly this includes out in the field. For a full list of features, consult the wiki.
summary: A CRUD (create,read,update,delete) system for Fiber Optic Networks.
